data.actual_result: Server mute/deafen icon on user's name is visible only when viewed in the server channel drawer but not when viewed in full screen voice channel page.
data.expected_result: Server mute/deafen icon should be visible in the voice channel page as well
data.short_description: Cannot see the server muted/deafened icon on user's name while in voice channel page.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join any voice channel with at least one more user (can be a bot also) - Click on voice channel to open it in full screen, now click on user and server mute/deafen the user. - Go back to server and notice the mute/deafen icon against the user's name
